|character          = Kamisato Ayaka

|zh                 = 
;今天是神里绫华的生日哦，我们快去为她庆祝吧！
:'''神里绫华：'''这样就做好了，尝尝看吧？
:'''派蒙：'''哇，绫华好厉害呀！旅行者，你泡的茶也不错嘛。
:'''旅行者：'''绫华一起吃吧？你的生日，应该是我们帮你才对。
:'''神里绫华：'''没关系，这样一边聊天一边做点心，对我来说是很难得的休息时间。
:'''神里绫华：'''反而是我要谢谢你愿意陪我，我很开心。
:（趁旅行者的注意力在绫华身上，派蒙又拿起了一块绯樱饼…）
:'''太郎丸：'''汪！
:'''旅行者：'''派蒙&mdash;&mdash;
:'''派蒙：'''唔…再吃最后一块！
|dialogue_review_zh =「反而是我要谢谢你愿意陪我，我很开心。」
|en                 =
;Today is [[Kamisato Ayaka]]'s birthday, let's go and celebrate with her!
:'''Kamisato Ayaka:''' There, it's done! Do you want to have a taste?
:'''Paimon:''' Whoa, you're amazing Ayaka! The tea you brewed is pretty good too, Traveler.
:'''Traveler:''' Do you want to eat together, Ayaka? It's your birthday, we should be the ones helping you out instead.
:'''Kamisato Ayaka:'''  Don't worry. I had a good time chatting and making desserts with you. It's rare for me to catch a break like this.
:'''Kamisato Ayaka:''' I should be the one thanking you for keeping me company today. I'm really happy.
:(While the Traveler is distracted talking to Ayaka, Paimon picks up another [[Sakura Mochi]]...)
:'''Taroumaru:''' Woof!
:'''Traveler:''' Paimon!
:'''Paimon:''' Mmph... Just one more slice!
|dialogue_review_en = "I should be the one thanking you for keeping me company today. I'm really happy."
